name: Eye of the Ouroboros
description:
The cycle of life, death, and rebirth continues...

(that is, if we had a complete game...)

The game really isn't finished.

We were designing a roguelike, but (as is with game jams) we ran out of time. This is more of a tech demo then an actual finished product. Hopefully we'll be continuing work on it after the jam! Despite all that, please, give us some feedback about what we have now!

Controls
  • WASD / Gamepad Left Stick - Move
  • R / Gamepad Right Shoulder - Reload
  • SPACE / Gamepad Face Button Bottom - Jump
  • F / Gamepad Face Button Top - Toggle view mode
  • Mouse / Gamepad Right Stick - Aim
  • SHIFT / Gamepad Left Trigger - Dash
Credits

  • Joe Keenan's desk (inspiration...?)
  • Terry Davis (here in spirit)

STEVE JOBS IS DEAD
COKE IS FUEL
SERVERS IS FULL
